title: 2022 NFL Futures & Odds Breakdown after Russell Wilson trade and Aaron Rodgers return + Seahawks enter rebuild mode (Football 3/10)
description:
Join the Pick Six March Madness Bracket Challenge for your chance to win a $100 Paramount Plus Gift Card! Enter here: cbssports.com/PickSixBrackets

Note: This episode was recorded before news of Carson Wentz being traded to the Commanders broke. 

Tuesday changed a lot across the NFL landscape, specifically when it comes to Super Bowl odds. On this episode Will Brinson is joined by Tyler Sullivan to break down what the moves mean when it comes to betting on futures. First, the guys discuss the Seahawks jumping into rebuild mode by parting ways with both Russell Wilson and Bobby Wagner (4:00). Then, they tackle AFC value picks to win the conference (17:30) and assess the best options to come out of the NFC (25:00).

'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Google Podcasts, Castbox and wherever else you listen to podcasts. 
You can listen to Pick Six on your smart speakers! Simply say "Alexa, play the latest episode of the Pick Six NFL podcast" or "Hey Google, play the latest episode of the Pick Six NFL podcast."
Follow the Pick Six team on Twitter: @picksixpod, @willbrinson, @ryanwilsonCBS, @johnbreech, @E_DeBerardinis
Visit the Pick Six YouTube channel: https://www.youtube.com/picksix
Visit the CBS Sports Store to buy Pick Six merch: https://store.cbssports.com/collections/pick-six
Check out the Pick Six Instagram page https://www.instagram.com/picksixpod/?hl=en
